title: Jest Task configuration
description: Defines Jest task configuration. Same definitions as Jest CLI has.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

isEnabled.description: Indicate whether the test is enabled

cache.description: Indicate whether Jest cache is enabled or not

cacheDirectory.description: The directory where Jest should store its cached information

collectCoverageFrom.description: Same as Jest CLI option collectCoverageFrom

coverage.description: Same as Jest CLI option coverage

coverageReporters.description: Same as Jest CLI option coverageReporters

testPathIgnorePatterns.description: Same as Jest CLI option testPathIgnorePatterns

moduleDirectories.description: Same as Jest CLI option moduleDirectories

maxWorkers.description: Same as Jest CLI option maxWorkers

testMatch.description: Same as Jest CLI option testMatch
